alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 11 at 2:55PM CST until March 13 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST SATURDAY TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR TONIGHT... * WHAT...The Freeze Warning for tonight has been cancelled. For the Freeze Warning Saturday night into Sunday morning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the Wind Advisory tonight into Saturday, north winds 20 to 25 mph and gusts to 40 mph expected, with higher gusts possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central, southeast, southwest and west central Mississippi and northeast Louisiana. * WHEN...Freeze Warning in effect from 6 PM CST Saturday to 9 AM CDT Sunday. Wind Advisory in effect from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas
